apiÔÉÅ

class api.api.DataAPI(symbols, num_years=100, period=None, api_source='yahoo', market_symbol='SPY', start_date=None, end_date=None)ÔÉÅ

Bases: object

Description:

Class for data api management.

Parameters:

  • symbols (list) ‚Äì List of symbols

  • num_years (int, optional) ‚Äì Number of years to look back, default is 100

  • period (str, optional) ‚Äì Period, default is ‚ÄòNone‚Äô. Choices include: ‚Äò1d‚Äô, ‚Äò5d‚Äô, ‚Äò7d‚Äô, ‚Äò60d‚Äô, ‚Äò1mo‚Äô, ‚Äò3mo‚Äô, ‚Äò6mo‚Äô, ‚Äò1y‚Äô, ‚Äò2y‚Äô, ‚Äò5y‚Äô, ‚Äò10y‚Äô, ‚Äòytd‚Äô, ‚Äòmax‚Äô

  • api_source (str, optional) ‚Äì API source, default is yahoo, other option is bloomberg

  • market_symbol (str, optional) ‚Äì Market symbol, default is SPY

  • start_date (str, optional) ‚Äì Start date, default is None

  • end_date (str, optional) ‚Äì End date, default is None

static process_symbols(symbols, api_source)ÔÉÅ
Description:

Process symbols based on the API source. Bloomberg symbols usually end with ‚Äò US Equity‚Äô, whereas Yahoo symbols do not.

Parameters:

  • symbols (list) ‚Äì List of symbols

  • api_source (str) ‚Äì API source, either ‚Äòyahoo‚Äô or ‚Äòbloomberg‚Äô

Returns:

Processed symbols
